name: SemoranBLVD
description:
Din din time.

This is a meme game where you shoot lots of pigs. Best when streamed on call with friends.

You... are a game developer knee-deep in the dreadful bowels of code when suddenly -gasp- 30-50 perfectly average pigs push through your apartment door! They aren't giving you a second to think, and they just keep coming! If you don't find a way to put a stop to the putrid pork's perturbing plans, prepare to never publish your prized passion-project...

Runtime: ~20 minutes

Size once extracted: 905MB

Input: Mouse & Keyboard, check Options for keybinds

CW: Blood, Animal death, Flashing lights

Dev

Avis Chambers ( twitter )

Audio

Tommy Icarus ( twitter / instagram ), Bart Sides, Rob Glass ( website )

Testing & Special Thanks

Ty Hajduk ( twitter ), Griffith Gosling ( twitter ), Gavin Gosling, Ant Tan, Shane Newville, Doubloons, and Don'tPutMeintheCredits

Morale Buffs

Shirley, Watson, Bandit

Using assets from the Unreal Marketplace:
  • SMART ArchViz Interior Pack 01 ( by 3D SMART )
  • Computers Pack (by HB )
  • All Platform Outline Pack ( by Jiffycrew )
  • Realistic Starter VFX Pack ( by FX Cat )
  • Blood: Customizable 4K ( by Underground Workshop Corp )
Thank you for your interest- please enjoy this short, pig-filled experience! Since the game is being distributed for free, the best way to show support for the team is to share this page and follow up on the links above <3
